title: Grave Robber - Novel Updates
author: 睡眠不足
description:
Haunted by his dreams, Xiao Bei, a man who has lived his entire life as something that could be expressed by the word, “Meaningless”, has begun to walk a new path.

One of a Tomb Raider.

Trying to help him, his friend had introduced him into a new world, one filled with monsters, deadly poisons, traps, curses, and various creatures of the supernatural. 

And for what, you may ask? 

Money! Lots of it.

But Xiao Bei was not enticed by the possible fame and fortune. He begins to venture this path only to find out the mysteries behind the very thing that has haunted him for the past twenty years.

Welcome to a world of thrills, adventure, and the supernatural.>
